topics.title: Basic Types & Type Casting
topics.code: # Primitive types x=42 # int y=3.14 # float s="hello" # str b=True # bool c=2+3j # complex # Casting int("42") # 42 float(7) # 7.0 str(3.14) # "3.14" bool(0) # False bin(10) # "0b1010" hex(255) # "0xff"

topics.title: String Operations & Methods
topics.code: s = "Python Rocks" s.upper() # "PYTHON ROCKS" s.lower() # "python rocks" s.split() # ["Python","Rocks"] s.replace("Rocks","Rules") s[0:6] # "Python" (slice) s[::-1] # reverse f"Name:{s}" # f-string " hi ".strip() # "hi" ",".join(["a","b"])# "a,b" s.count("o") # 2 s.startswith("Py")# True

topics.title: Lists & Comprehensions
topics.code: lst=[1,2,3] lst.append(6) # O(1) lst.insert(0,0) # O(n) lst.pop() # O(1) lst.sort() # Timsort O(n log n) sorted(lst,key=lambda x:-x) # Comprehensions evens =[x for x in lst if x%2==0] squares=[x**2 for x in range(10)] flat =[n for r in mat for n in r]

topics.title: Dictionaries, Counter & defaultdict
topics.code: from collections import Counter, defaultdict d={"a":1} d.get("c",0) # safe access d.setdefault("d",[]) {**d1,**d2} # merge dicts # Counter cnt=Counter("abracadabra") cnt.most_common(3) # top 3 # defaultdict g=defaultdict(list) g["a"].append("b") # Dict comprehension sq={x:x**2 for x in range(6)}

topics.title: Sets & Frozensets
topics.code: s1={1,2,3}; s2={3,4,5} s1.add(7) # O(1) s1.discard(99) # no error if absent s1 & s2 # intersection s1 | s2 # union s1 - s2 # difference s1 ^ s2 # symmetric diff s1.issubset(s2) # Frozenset (hashable) fs=frozenset([1,2]) # Dedup preserving order list(dict.fromkeys(lst))

topics.title: Stack, Queue, Deque & Heap
topics.code: from collections import deque import heapq # Stack (LIFO) stk=[]; stk.append(1); stk.pop() # Queue (FIFO) q=deque() q.append(1) # enqueue q.popleft() # dequeue q.appendleft(0)# prepend # Min-Heap h=[3,1,4]; heapq.heapify(h) heapq.heappush(h,2) heapq.heappop(h) # â†’ 1 # Max-heap: negate heapq.heappush(h,-5)

topics.title: Linked List
topics.code: class Node: def __init__(self,v): self.val=v; self.next=None # Reverse def reverse(head): prev,cur=None,head while cur: nxt=cur.next cur.next=prev prev,cur=cur,nxt return prev # Fast/slow pointer (cycle) def has_cycle(h): s=f=h while f and f.next: s=s.next; f=f.next.next if s==f: return True

topics.title: Trees & Binary Search Tree
topics.code: class TreeNode: def __init__(self,v=0): self.val=v; self.left=self.right=None # Inorder (sorted for BST) def inorder(r): if not r: return [] return inorder(r.left)+[r.val]+inorder(r.right) # Level-order BFS from collections import deque def bfs(root): q=deque([root]) while q: n=q.popleft() if n.left: q.append(n.left) if n.right: q.append(n.right)

topics.title: Loops, Enumerate, zip & Comprehensions
topics.code: for i,v in enumerate(["a","b"]): print(i,v) for a,b in zip([1,2],[3,4]): print(a,b) # while + else while n>0: n//=2 else: print("done") # Walrus operator := while (n:=int(input()))!=0: print(n) # Dict / set comprehension sq={x:x**2 for x in range(5)} # Generator (lazy) g=(x**2 for x in range(1000))

topics.title: Functions, Lambda & Higher-Order
topics.code: def greet(name,msg="Hi"): return f"{msg},{name}" def total(*args,**kw): return sum(args),kw # Lambda + HOF sq=lambda x:x**2 list(map(sq,[1,2,3])) # [1,4,9] list(filter(lambda x:x>2,[1,2,3])) # Sort with multi-key sorted(words,key=lambda w:(len(w),w)) # Unpack a,*b,c=[1,2,3,4,5]

topics.title: Decorators, Closures & functools
topics.code: from functools import wraps,lru_cache,partial,reduce # Closure def counter(): n=0 def inc(): nonlocal n; n+=1; return n return inc # Decorator with @wraps def log(f): @wraps(f) def wrapper(*a,**kw): print(f.__name__) return f(*a,**kw) return wrapper @lru_cache(maxsize=128) def fib(n): return n if n<=1 else fib(n-1)+fib(n-2) double=partial(pow,exp=2)

topics.title: Classes, Inheritance & Dunder Methods
topics.code: class Animal: count=0 def __init__(self,n): self.name=n; Animal.count+=1 def __repr__(self): return f"Animal({self.name})" def __eq__(self,o): return self.name==o.name def __len__(self): return len(self.name) def speak(self): raise NotImplementedError class Dog(Animal): def speak(self): return "Woof!" def __add__(self,o): return Dog(self.name+o.name)

topics.title: Dataclasses, ABC & Properties
topics.code: from dataclasses import dataclass,field from abc import ABC,abstractmethod @dataclass(order=True,frozen=True) class Point: x: float y: float tags: list = field(default_factory=list) # Abstract Base Class class Shape(ABC): @abstractmethod def area(self)->float: ... class Circle(Shape): def __init__(self,r): self._r=r @property def area(self): return 3.14159*self._r**2 @area.setter def area(self,v): self._r=(v/3.14159)**.5

topics.title: Sorting Algorithms
topics.code: # Merge Sort O(n log n) def merge_sort(a): if len(a)<=1: return a m=len(a)//2 L,R=merge_sort(a[:m]),merge_sort(a[m:]) return merge(L,R) # Quick Sort O(n log n) avg def qsort(a): if len(a)<=1: return a p=a[len(a)//2] return(qsort([x for x in a if x<p])+ [x for x in a if x==p]+ qsort([x for x in a if x>p]))

topics.title: Binary Search & bisect
topics.code: import bisect # Classic binary search O(log n) def bsearch(a,t): lo,hi=0,len(a)-1 while lo<=hi: m=lo+(hi-lo)//2 if a[m]==t: return m elif a[m]<t: lo=m+1 else: hi=m-1 return -1 # Python stdlib bisect bisect.bisect_left(a,t) # left insertion pt bisect.bisect_right(a,t) # right insertion pt bisect.insort(a,v) # sorted insert

topics.title: Dynamic Programming
topics.code: from functools import lru_cache # Top-down (memoization) @lru_cache(maxsize=None) def fib(n): if n<=1: return n return fib(n-1)+fib(n-2) # Bottom-up tabulation (LCS) def lcs(a,b): m,n=len(a),len(b) dp=[[0]*(n+1) for _ in range(m+1)] for i in range(1,m+1): for j in range(1,n+1): if a[i-1]==b[j-1]: dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1]+1 else: dp[i][j]=max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]) return dp[m][n]

topics.title: Graph Algorithms â€” BFS, DFS, Dijkstra
topics.code: from collections import deque import heapq # BFS â€” shortest unweighted path def bfs(g,s): vis,q={s:0},deque([s]) while q: u=q.popleft() for v in g[u]: if v not in vis: vis[v]=vis[u]+1; q.append(v) # Dijkstra â€” weighted shortest path def dijkstra(g,s): dist={s:0}; pq=[(0,s)] while pq: d,u=heapq.heappop(pq) if d>dist.get(u,float("inf")): continue for v,w in g[u]: if d+w<dist.get(v,float("inf")): dist[v]=d+w; heapq.heappush(pq,(dist[v],v)) return dist

topics.title: Two Pointers & Sliding Window
topics.code: # Two pointers â€” pair sum def two_sum_sorted(a,t): l,r=0,len(a)-1 while l<r: s=a[l]+a[r] if s==t: return [l,r] elif s<t: l+=1 else: r-=1 # Variable sliding window def min_window_sum(a,t): l=tot=0; best=float("inf") for r,v in enumerate(a): tot+=v while tot>=t: best=min(best,r-l+1) tot-=a[l]; l+=1 return best

topics.title: Recursion & Backtracking
topics.code: # Backtracking template def backtrack(state,choices): if is_solution(state): res.append(state[:]); return for c in choices: if is_valid(state,c): state.append(c) # choose backtrack(state,choices) state.pop() # unchoose # Subsets def subsets(nums): res=[[]] for n in nums: res+=[s+[n] for s in res] return res

topics.title: itertools â€” Combinatorics & Iteration
topics.code: import itertools as it list(it.permutations([1,2,3])) list(it.combinations([1,2,3],2)) list(it.combinations_with_replacement([1,2],2)) list(it.product("AB",repeat=2)) list(it.chain([1,2],[3,4])) list(it.accumulate([1,2,3,4])) # prefix sums list(it.groupby("aabbc")) # runs list(it.islice(range(100),5)) # take 5 it.starmap(pow,[(2,3),(3,2)]) # [8,9]

topics.title: Regex (re module)
topics.code: import re # Common patterns EMAIL = r"[\w.+-]+@[\w-]+\.[a-z]{2,}" PHONE = r"\+?\d[\d\s.-]{7,}\d" URL = r"https?://[\w./%-]+" re.match(pat,s) # from start re.search(pat,s) # anywhere re.findall(pat,s) # all matches re.sub(pat,"r",s) # replace re.split(r"\W+",s) # split m=re.search(r"(\d+)",s) m.group(1) # capture group

topics.title: Exception Handling & Custom Exceptions
topics.code: # Custom exception hierarchy class AppError(Exception): pass class ValidationError(AppError): def __init__(self,f,m): super().__init__(f"{f}: {m}") self.field=f try: x=int(input()) if x<0: raise ValidationError("x","must be +ve") except ValidationError as e: print(e.field) except (ValueError,TypeError): print("type error") else: print("OK") finally: print("always")

topics.title: Math, Number Theory & Bit Manipulation
topics.code: import math from math import gcd,lcm,isqrt,comb,perm gcd(12,18) # 6 lcm(4,6) # 12 isqrt(17) # 4 comb(10,3) # 120 math.ceil(7/2) # 4 # Bit manipulation n & (n-1) # clear lowest set bit n & -n # isolate lowest set bit bin(n).count("1") # popcount 1 << k # 2^k (n>>k)&1 # kth bit

topics.title: Generators, Iterators & Context Managers
topics.code: # Custom iterator class Counter: def __init__(self,n): self.n=n; self.i=0 def __iter__(self): return self def __next__(self): if self.i>=self.n: raise StopIteration self.i+=1; return self.i-1 # Infinite generator def fib(): a,b=0,1 while True: yield a; a,b=b,a+b # Context manager (class) class Timer: def __enter__(self): import time; self.t=time.time(); return self def __exit__(self,*a): print(time.time()-self.t)

topics.title: async / await & Concurrency
topics.code: import asyncio async def fetch(url:str)->str: await asyncio.sleep(1) return f"data:{url}" async def main(): # Concurrent execution res=await asyncio.gather( fetch("u1"),fetch("u2")) # Task t=asyncio.create_task(fetch("bg")) await t # Timeout async with asyncio.timeout(5.0): await fetch("slow") asyncio.run(main())

topics.title: Type Hints & Pattern Matching (3.10+)
topics.code: from typing import List,Dict,Optional,Union,TypeVar,Callable T=TypeVar("T") def first(lst:List[T])->Optional[T]: return lst[0] if lst else None def f(x:Union[int,str])->str: return str(x) # Pattern matching Python 3.10+ match point: case (0,0): print("Origin") case (x,0): print(f"x={x}") case (x,y): print(f"({x},{y})") case _: print("?")
